There are several ways to generate presentations directly with a and RStudio. The most widely used are to use [LaTeX's beamer class with RMarkdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/beamer_presentation_format.html) (produces a pdf with slides) or use [R presentations](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200486468-Authoring-R-Presentations) as it comes with RStudio.
